Text: The announcement comes in the backdrop of India's merchandise exports declining by 6.05 per cent to USD 26.13 billion in August compared to the year-ago month.
Cause: The announcement comes in the backdrop of India's merchandise exports declining by 6.05 per cent
Effect: USD 26.13 billion in August compared to the year-ago month.
Sentence: <e1>The announcement comes in the backdrop of India's merchandise exports declining by 6.05 per cent</e1> to <e2>USD 26.13 billion in August compared to the year-ago month.</e2>
